description:
Blast up to the lookout before the crowd catches up. The MQM 3 Mid looks like a hiking boot but has the soul of an ultra-athletic trail runner, so you can get into your hiking flow state fast. GORE-TEX® waterproof-breathable tech stands up to spontaneous showers without suffocating your feet. An integrated rock plate protect your feet against trail bumps and a sticky Vibram® TC5+ rubber outsole helps you stay upright on slippery rocks and mud.

  • Ballistic mesh upper with TPU overlays for durability
  • GORE-TEX® waterproof-breathable membrane keeps water out while letting sweat escape
  • Bellows tongue keeps out water and debris
  • Recycled mesh lining wicks sweat away from your foot
  • Air Cushion heel absorbs shock for a comfortable ride
  • Super Rebound Compound maximizes shock absorption and comfort
  • Vibram® TC5+ rubber outsole with 5mm lugs for flexible, grippy and durable performance
name: Merrell MQM 3 Mid Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes - Men's
